title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 318.3 - Designation of places of receipt of products and other articles for reinspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 318.3 - Designation of places of receipt of products and other articles for reinspection

State Regulations

Every official establishment shall designate, with the
approval of the officer in charge, a dock or place at which products and other
articles subject to reinspection under section
318.2
shall be received, and such
products and articles shall be received only at such dock or
place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
318.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
